key.name: tabs-open-position
key.summary: Where to position newly open tabs in browser windows.
key.description: If set to "after-current-tab", then new tabs are inserted after the current tab. If set to "end", then new tabs are appended to the end of the tab list.

key.summary: Enables the classic Nemo behavior, where all windows are browsers
key.description: If set to true, then all Nemo windows will be browser windows. This is how Nemo used to behave before version 2.6, and some people prefer this behavior.

key.name: quick-renames-with-pause-in-between
key.summary: Enables renaming of icons by two times clicking with pause between clicks
key.description: If set to true, then icons in all Nemo windows will be able to get renamed quickly. Users should click two times on icons with a pause time more than double-click time of their system.

key.summary: Show Thumbnails button in nemo toolbar
key.description: If set to true, then Nemo browser windows will show the button.

key.name: show-root-warning
key.summary: Show warning when opening as root
key.description: If set to true, then Nemo show warning message when run Nemo as root user.

key.name: confirm-move-to-trash
key.summary: Whether to ask for confirmation when moving files to Trash
key.description: If set to true, then Nemo will ask for confirmation when you attempt to move files to the Trash.

key.name: confirm-trash
key.summary: Whether to ask for confirmation when deleting files, or emptying Trash
key.description: If set to true, then Nemo will ask for confirmation when you attempt to delete files, or empty the Trash.

key.name: enable-delete
key.summary: Whether to enable immediate deletion
key.description: If set to true, then Nemo will have a feature allowing you to delete a file immediately and in-place, instead of moving it to the trash. This feature can be dangerous, so use caution.

key.name: swap-trash-delete
key.summary: Whether to swap the hotkeys for Trash and Delete
key.description: If set to true, the Delete key will permanently delete a file, and the Shift-Delete key will only trash a file.

key.name: show-directory-item-counts
key.summary: When to show number of items in a folder
key.description: Speed tradeoff for when to show the number of items in a folder. If set to "always" then always show item counts, even if the folder is on a remote server. If set to "local-only" then only show counts for local file systems. If set to "never" then never bother to compute item counts.

key.name: click-policy
key.summary: Type of click used to launch/open files
key.description: Possible values are "single" to launch files on a single click, or "double" to launch them on a double click.

key.name: executable-text-activation
key.summary: What to do with executable text files when activated
key.description: What to do with executable text files when they are activated (single or double clicked). Possible values are "launch" to launch them as programs, "ask" to ask what to do via a dialog, and "display" to display them as text files.

key.name: image-viewers-with-external-sort
key.summary: Image viewer executables to pass sort order to
key.description: When opening a single image with an application in this list, allow that viewer to display other images in the current nemo view, in the presented order (including searches). Other image viewers can be added, but are likely to ignore the order. The viewer Exec line must accept a list of files (either %U or %F).

key.name: mouse-use-extra-buttons
key.summary: Use extra mouse button events in Nemo' browser window
key.description: For users with mice that have "Forward" and "Back" buttons, this key will determine if any action is taken inside of Nemo when either is pressed.

key.name: mouse-forward-button
key.summary: Mouse button to activate the "Forward" command in browser window
key.description: For users with mice that have buttons for "Forward" and "Back", this key will set which button activates the "Forward" command in a browser window. Possible values range between 6 and 14.

key.name: mouse-back-button
key.summary: Mouse button to activate the "Back" command in browser window
key.description: For users with mice that have buttons for "Forward" and "Back", this key will set which button activates the "Back" command in a browser window. Possible values range between 6 and 14.

key.name: show-image-thumbnails
key.summary: When to show thumbnails of image files
key.description: Speed tradeoff for when to show an image file as a thumbnail. If set to "always" then always thumbnail, even if the folder is on a remote server. If set to "local-only" then only show thumbnails for local file systems. If set to "never" then never bother to thumbnail images, just use a generic icon.

key.name: inherit-show-thumbnails
key.summary: Inherit thumbnail visibility from parent
key.description: If set, folders will inherit their thumbnail visibility from their parents

key.name: thumbnail-limit
key.summary: Maximum image size for thumbnailing
key.description: Images over this size (in bytes) won't be thumbnailed. The purpose of this setting is to avoid thumbnailing large images that may take a long time to load or use lots of memory.

key.name: show-advanced-permissions
key.summary: Show advanced permissions in the file property dialog
key.description: If set to true, then Nemo lets you edit and display file permissions in a more unix-like way, accessing some more esoteric options.

key.name: sort-directories-first
key.summary: Show folders first in windows
key.description: If set to true, then Nemo shows folders prior to showing files in the icon and list views.

key.name: sort-favorites-first
key.summary: Show favorites first in windows
key.description: If set to true, then Nemo shows favorites prior to other files in the icon and list views.

key.name: default-sort-order
key.summary: Default sort order
key.description: The default sort-order for items in the icon view. Possible values are "name", "size", "type" and "mtime".

key.name: default-sort-in-reverse-order
key.summary: Reverse sort order in new windows
key.description: If true, files in new windows will be sorted in reverse order. ie, if sorted by name, then instead of sorting the files from "a" to "z", they will be sorted from "z" to "a"; if sorted by size, instead of being incrementally they will be sorted decrementally.

key.name: desktop-is-home-dir
key.summary: Nemo uses the users home folder as the desktop
key.description: If set to true, then Nemo will use the user's home folder as the desktop. If it is false, then it will use ~/Desktop as the desktop.

key.name: default-folder-viewer
key.summary: Default folder viewer
key.description: When a folder is visited this viewer is used unless you have selected another view for that particular folder. Possible values are "list-view", "icon-view" and "compact-view".

key.name: inherit-folder-viewer
key.summary: Inherit the view type (icon, compact, list) from parent to children
key.description: When a folder is visited the viewer is inherited from that folder's parent unless you have selected another view for that particular folder.

key.name: date-format
key.summary: Date Format
key.description: The format of file dates. Possible values are "locale", "iso", and "informal".

key.name: date-format-monospace
key.summary: Whether to display iso and locale date formats with a monospace font.
key.description: If true, date columns in the list view will be displayed using a monospace font. A best effort will be done to select a font that matces the current system font.

key.name: show-hidden-files
key.summary: Whether to show hidden files
key.description: If set to true, then hidden files are shown by default in the file manager. Hidden files are either dotfiles, listed in the folder's .hidden file or backup files ending with a tilde (~).

key.name: show-full-path-titles
key.summary: Whether to show the full path of the current view in the title bar and tab bars
key.description: If set to true, will show the normal title of a window or tab, followed by the full path to that location in parentheses.

key.name: bulk-rename-tool
key.summary: Bulk rename utility
key.description: If set, Nemo will append URIs of selected files and treat the result as a command line for bulk renaming. Bulk rename applications can register themselves in this key by setting the key to a space-separated string of their executable name and any command line options. If the executable name is not set to a full path, it will be searched for in the search path.

key.name: size-prefixes
key.summary: Prefixes used for file sizes
key.description: Determines whether Nemo uses base-10, base-10 long, base-2 or base-2 long file size prefixes

key.name: close-device-view-on-device-eject
key.summary: Whether to close a view of a removeable device instead of navigating Home
key.description: If set to true, a view open for a removeable device will be closed instead of sent Home if the device is ejected

key.name: start-with-dual-pane
key.summary: Whether to default to showing dual-pane view when a new window is opened
key.description: If set to true, new Nemo windows will default to showing two panes

key.name: ignore-view-metadata
key.summary: Whether to ignore folder metadata for view zoom levels and layouts
key.description: If set to true, views will not change according to their metadata, but stay consistent for the life of that window

key.name: show-bookmarks-in-to-menus
key.summary: Whether to list bookmarks in the Move To/Copy To menus
key.description: If set to true, bookmarks will be listed in the MoveTo/CopyTo menus

key.name: show-places-in-to-menus
key.summary: Whether to list places in the Move To/Copy To menus
key.description: If set to true, places will be listed in the MoveTo/CopyTo menus

key.description: If true, tooltips will be displayed for icon and compact view items

key.name: tooltips-in-list-view

key.description: If true, tooltips will show their creation date.

key.name: tooltips-show-path
key.summary: Show full path in tooltip
key.description: If true, tooltips will show the file's full path.

key.name: disable-menu-warning

key.description: If true, you will no longer recieve a popup explaining how to reactivate the main menu once you've hidden it

key.name: last-server-connect-method

key.summary: If true, all file operations will start immediately

key.name: click-double-parent-folder
key.summary: If true, double click left on blank area will go to parent folder

key.name: enable-mime-actions-make-executable
key.summary: Display the 'Make executable and run' button in the mime-action dialog (open an unknown filetype)

key.name: deferred-attribute-preload-limit
key.summary: Maximum number of files to preload deferred attributes for when opening a directory
key.description: Certain file attributes (like thumbnail and extension info) are deferred until a folder finishes loading. This number specifies how many files to skip this behavior on so that smaller folders won't have an obvious delay when loading these attributes.

key.name: treat-root-as-normal
key.summary: Suppress any safeguards when running nemo/nemo-desktop as the root user. For some systems there is only a root user.

key.name: detect-content
key.summary: If true, enable detection of the type of content of a mounted media and display a suggested application to open the media.

key.name: captions
key.summary: List of possible captions on icons
key.description: A list of captions below an icon in the icon view and the desktop. The actual number of captions shown depends on the zoom level. Some possible values are: "size", "type", "date_modified", "date_changed", "date_accessed", "owner", "group", "permissions", "octal_permissions" and "mime_type".

key.name: default-use-tighter-layout
key.summary: deprecated - not used

key.name: labels-beside-icons
key.summary: Put labels beside icons
key.description: If true, labels will be placed beside icons rather than underneath them.

key.name: default-zoom-level
key.summary: Default icon zoom level
key.description: Default zoom level used by the icon view.

key.name: thumbnail-size
key.summary: Default Thumbnail Icon Size
key.description: The default size of an icon for a thumbnail in the icon view.

key.name: text-ellipsis-limit
key.summary: Text Ellipsis Limit
key.description:
A string specifying how parts of overlong file names should be replaced by ellipses, depending on the zoom level. Each of the list entries is of the form "Zoom Level:Integer". For each specified zoom level, if the given integer is larger than 0, the file name will not exceed the given number of lines. If the integer is 0 or smaller, no limit is imposed on the specified zoom level. A default entry of the form "Integer" without any specified zoom level is also allowed. It defines the maximum number of lines for all other zoom levels. Examples: 0 - always display overlong file names; 3 - shorten file names if they exceed three lines; smallest:5,smaller:4,0 - shorten file names if they exceed five lines for zoom level "smallest". Shorten file names if they exceed four lines for zoom level "smaller". Do not shorten file names for other zoom levels.
Available zoom levels: smallest (33%), smaller (50%), small (66%), standard (100%), large (150%), larger (200%), largest (400%)

key.description: Overrides the standard vertical spacing for the desktop grid, in situation where default spacing is not ideal due to label customizations. This is a value from 0.5 to 1.5, with 1.0 being no adjustment, and 0.5 being half the default spacing.

key.description: If this is set to true, an icon linking to the home folder will be put on the desktop.

key.name: computer-icon-visible

key.description: If this is set to true, an icon linking to the computer location will be put on the desktop.

key.name: trash-icon-visible

key.description: If this is set to true, an icon linking to the trash will be put on the desktop.

key.name: volumes-visible

key.name: network-icon-visible
key.summary: Network Servers icon visible on the desktop
key.description: If this is set to true, an icon linking to the Network Servers view will be put on the desktop.

key.name: text-ellipsis-limit
key.summary: Text Ellipsis Limit
key.description: An integer specifying how parts of overlong file names should be replaced by ellipses on the desktop. If the number is larger than 0, the file name will not exceed the given number of lines. If the number is 0 or smaller, no limit is imposed on the number of displayed lines.

key.name: ignored-desktop-handlers

key.description: Nemo checks for _NET_WM_WINDOW_TYPE_DESKTOP-type windows, and skips managing the desktop if any others are detected. Add potential names to this list to ignore when performing this check. This means that you want nemo to create its own desktop window(s) even though something else already seems to. The check is based on a program's WM_CLASS.

key.name: background-fade
key.summary: Fade the background on change

key.name: geometry
